org.conqat.lib.commons.resources

Class ResourceUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.conqat.lib.commons.resources.ResourceUtils

  • public class ResourceUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for listing resources in a given path.

    • Constructor Summary

      ResourceUtils()

      static java.lang.String getPackageResourcePath(java.lang.Class<?> contextClass)
      Gets the path to resources of given context class (relative to class-resources folder).

      Lists all resources in the given path (non-recursive).

    • Constructor Detail

        public ResourceUtils()

    • Method Detail

      • listResources

        public static java.util.List<Resource> listResources(java.lang.Class<?> contextClass,
                                                     java.lang.String path)
        Lists all resources in the given path (non-recursive). Only resources and no resource folders will be returned.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to list resources from. An empty string means the root of the contextClass' package.

      • listResourcesRecursively

        public static java.util.List<Resource> listResourcesRecursively(java.lang.Class<?> contextClass,
                                                                java.lang.String path)
        Lists all resources in the given path (recursively). Only resources and no resource folders will be returned.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to list resources from. An empty string means the root of the contextClass' package.

      • getPackageResourcePath

        public static java.lang.String getPackageResourcePath(java.lang.Class<?> contextClass)
        Gets the path to resources of given context class (relative to class-resources folder).
        Parameters:
        contextClass - The class for which path to resources should be returned

      • getFileBackedResource

        public static Resource getFileBackedResource(Resource resource)
